title: Windows 8.1 Pro VL X86 Multi-12 Pre-Activated Update 3 Nov 2014
description:
Windows 8.1 Pro VL X86 Multi-12 Pre-Activated Nov 2014


[ RELEASE INFO ]

  * This release contains one ISO [SOURCE ISO] and eleven exe-files.
  * All exe-files are created from original MSDN ISO's for each language.
  * This is done with SmartVersion, a program that calculates only the 
    difference between two files (one of which is used as the source) 
    and then creates an exe-file based on that difference.

  * Hashes attached in a separate .txt 


[ DOWNLOAD INFO ]

  * Download the Source ISO and preferred language.exe
  * If you want en-US then just download the SOURCE ISO
 
  * Run the exe-file in the same folder as the SOURCE ISO.
    This will extract & recreate the original ISO, fully updated and
    in the selected language.


[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

  * Windows 8.1 Pro VL	         


[ LANGUAGES & SOURCES ]

  * da-DK  [Danish]	  	  X19-49811
  * de-DE  [German]		  X19-50003
  * en-US  [English]		  X19-49875
  * es-ES  [Spanish]		  X19-50486
  * fi-FI  [Finnish]	 	  X19-49947
  * fr-FR  [French]		  X19-50011
  * it-IT  [Italian]		  X19-50123
  * nb-NO  [Norwegian]		  X19-50292
  * nl-NL  [Dutch]		  X19-49819
  * pt-BR  [Brazilian Portuguese] X19-49635
  * pt-PT  [Portuguese]		  X19-50358
  * sv-SE  [Swedish]		  X19-50586


[SOURCE ISO]

  * W81.Pro.X86.en-US.iso       Size: 4,00GB


[ EXE-FILES ]			
 
  * W81.Pro.X86.da-DK.exe	Size:  293MB

  * W81.Pro.X86.de-DE.exe	Size:  373MB

  * W81.Pro.X86.es-ES.exe	Size:  366MB

  * W81.Pro.X86.fi-FI.exe	Size:  291MB

  * W81.Pro.X86.fr-FR.exe	Size:  434MB

  * W81.Pro.X86.it-IT.exe	Size:  309MB

  * W81.Pro.X86.nb-NO.exe	Size:  301MB

  * W81.Pro.X86.nl-NL.exe	Size:  299MB

  * W81.Pro.X86.pt-BR.exe	Size:  325MB

  * W81.Pro.X86.pt-PT.exe	Size:  315MB

  * W81.Pro.X86.sv-SE.exe	Size:  366MB
 

[ CONTENTS ]

  Integrated:

  * .NET Framework 3.5
  * .NET Framework 4.5.3 Preview (KB2969351)
  * Hotfixes - 2014-11-11

   Setupcomplete / Post-install:

  * DirectX June 2010
  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates


[ FEATURES ]
  
  * Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
    

[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

  * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.
  * To Pre-Activate Windows, select "KMSPico" and "Begin Install".
  * To skip activation, just click on "Exit".   
  
  Activator:

  * KMSpico v10.0.1 Portable Edition 

    
[ INSTALLATION ]

  * Create bootable USB (highly recommended), minimum 8GB, with Rufus (attached) 
    or, if you really must; burn to DVD at slow speed.
 

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
  Generation2
